thread.title: Miley Cyrus gives Super Bowl a miss, performs Saraswati Puja
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus gives Super Bowl a miss, performs Saraswati Puja

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Miley Cyrus gives Super Bowl a miss, performs Saraswati Puja
text:
Do the quirk like Miley does. Mumbai: Miley Cyrus is maverick, zany and incorrigibly quirky.
The 24-year-old pop-star, has often been in the news, for the most unpredictable of reasons.
And now unlike the entire American populace, Miley gave Super Bowl 51 a miss, and instead performed 'Saraswati Puja' at her house.
Yes, you heard that right!
Well, Miley hasn't been too subtle about her love for the cultural and traditional tropes of India, having got the words 'Om' and 'Karma' tattooed on her.
Well, with each passing day, Miley is increasingly becoming the personification of all things quirky. And boy are we loving it!
